::Shadow Wing::
"I speak the truth.  The others I am speaking of are Maximals.  They are 
bots very much like us.  They serve the Matrix.  We work for the purpose of 
good itself.  We defend others aginst the Predacons and a new threat, the 
New Comers.  They both wish to use this planets resources and destroy all 
the life on it for thier own will and care nothing for anyone but 
themselves.  They kill for pleasure and nothing else." She sighed and looked 
into his almost hypnotic eyes.
"This war is sensless and painful for all. But I'd be honored if you'd join 
me and fight with me for what is right and just."
She smiled at him.  She kind of liked him a little.
"It's not easy doing the right thing. Could even get you yourself killed. 
But, I know that it would be worth it to die doing what is right.  If you 
decide not to join me, I will understand.  The right thing isn't always the 
easiest thing to be doing."



-------Original Message--------
